{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Duat Hall|It|Duat Hall}} can be accessed through the underground [[Teleport Waypoint]] directly south of The Mausoleum of King Deshret. It is connected to the [[Great Hall of Truths]].</p><!--

--><p>It requires the [[Scarlet Sand Slate#Hidden Clearance|Ferryman's Clearance]] to open the door and gain access.</p>}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description/Viewpoint|The Bottomless Hall}}
{{Description|The bottomless hall yawns open like the nether realm itself. The guilty or those who disrespected King Deshret shall meet their destiny here, while those who pass their trials shall fly over the invisible river and continue onward.|[[Scarlet Sand Slate#Delving Deeper|Scarlet Sand Slate: Delving Deeper]]}}

==Trivia==
* Falling into the void at the bottom will respawn the player at the entrance without any HP or energy penalty.
{{Dialogue Start}}
::'''Paimon:''' Watch out! Don't go near there!
{{Dialogue End}}

===Etymology===
* The {{Lang|''{{w|Duat}}''|egy=dwꜣt}} is the realm of the dead in ancient Egyptian mythology.
